attributes.action: Make the enquiry into the invasion of Iraq made public and ensure where fault is decided upon blame will be apportioned.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The invasion into Iraq was based upon a false premis: that Iraq held weapons of mass destruction. This was blatantly untrue and those who sought to mislead should be disciplined, for the sake of those troops who gave their lives in that conflict. The truth behind the invasion should be made public knowledge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
